General.Name: Itama Ranoraya
General.Description: PT Itama Ranoraya Tbk trades in laboratory and pharmaceutical equipment, and medical devices in Indonesia. It offers electromedical and non-electromedical medical equipment, in vitro diagnostic products, and other products. The company's products include Covid and infectious disease rapid test, abbott, auto disable syringe, disinfectant, and other products, as well as USG machine. It is also involved in the office space rental business. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT Itama Ranoraya Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Global Dinamika Kencana.
General.Address: MT. Haryono Square, Jakarta Timur, Indonesia, 13330

3.Name: Mr. Christian  Prawiro
